plot: Three Young Musician of the Year finalists battle it out to win the coveted title on the eve of the competition. All three feel that their undoubted talent may need something a bit stronger...
title: Il maestro
plot_es: Three Young Musician of the Year finalists battle it out to win the coveted title on the eve of the competition. All three feel that their undoubted talent may need something a bit stronger...
plot_en: Three Young Musician of the Year finalists battle it out to win the coveted title on the eve of the competition. All three feel that their undoubted talent may need something a bit stronger...
